title: Snakes and Ladders

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect the switch to the All-Turn-It Spinner
• Set up a game of snakes and ladders (could put the game onto a smartboard in a classroom for the whole class to play)
• The switch user can play the game by hitting their switch to roll the dice on the All-Turn-It Spinner

tooltipText: Use an All-Turn-It Spinner (or similar) to join in a game of Snakes and Ladders
